subtitle: VIX level — market fear proxy for regime gating.

measures.how_to_read: Higher VIX implies higher market volatility and risk; many systems reduce risk above thresholds (e.g., 25).
measures.caveats: VIX applies to S&P 500; relevance varies by asset.
measures.what_it_measures: CBOE VIX level — implied vol of S&P 500 options.

assistant_hints: Use as a risk gate/tilt, not an entry signal.
Thresholds are policy choices; 20–25 often a caution zone.
Daily values are stabler than intraday for gating.
Pair with IV rank or momentum for nuanced decisions.
beginner_summary: VIX level — market fear proxy for regime gating.
